attributes.action: Better Justice for all & NO suspended sentence's
attributes.additional_details:
NO to suspended sentence's

If someone is commiting a crime, we need more consistency in the sentence's being handed out.

At present, due to the sentence's being handed out, there is no deterrent for criminals.

YES to stricter and more consistant sentences being handed out.

When someone has the policed called to them more than 140 times within 5 years, and no legal action is ever taken against that individual, questions must be asked!

Make people feel safe again!
